channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Benchmark in talks to lead Series A for Greptile, valuing AI-code reviewer at $180M, sources say
item.description: YC alum Greptile raises $30M Series A.

item.title: Why a Y Combinator startup tackling AI agents for Windows gave up and pivoted
item.description: Pig.dev was working on a problem that could have been revolutionary: agent tech for controlling Windows desktops.

item.title: Roborock Saros Z70 Review: OmniGrip Doesn’t Quite Work
item.description: I tested the robot vacuum with the retractable arm, which got a lot of attention at CES. It still has a long way to go.

item.title: Apple Sues the YouTuber Who Leaked iOS 26
item.description: In a lawsuit filed against prominent leaker Jon Prosser, Apple alleges a conspiracy to break into a development device and steal its trade secrets. Pr...

item.title: Lettuce Grow Indoor Farmstand Review: Grow Your Own
item.description: This flashy indoor hydroponic garden is a great way to grow your own greens. Just watch out for bugs.

item.title: How China’s Patriotic ‘Honkers’ Became the Nation’s Elite Cyberspies
item.description: A new report traces the history of the early wave of Chinese hackers who became the backbone of the state's espionage apparatus.

item.title: ServiceNow’s acquisition of Moveworks is reportedly being reviewed over antitrust concerns
item.description: The probe into the acquisition, which was announced in March, began in June according to sources familiar with the matter.

item.title: What is Mistral AI? Everything to know about the OpenAI competitor
item.description: Mistral AI, the French company behind AI assistant Le Chat and several foundational models, is officially regarded as one of France’s most promising t...

item.title: Cursor snaps up enterprise startup Koala in challenge to GitHub Copilot
item.description: Cursor maker Anysphere is snapping up top talent from AI enterprise startups in an effort to compete with Microsoft's GitHub Copilot.

item.title: This Turbo Escooter Wants to Set a Guinness World Record
item.description: With Formula One expertise, Bo plans to break 100 miles per hour on its nearly $30,000 Turbo scooter.
